```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/FROST-SUMMER-2022/Winter2021")

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)  
CK3.2 <- read_excel("FROST Grading CK 3.2_final (Winter 2021).xlsx")
```

```{r}
CK3.2_clean = subset(CK3.2, select = -c(Student:GroupCK.3.2))

CK3.2_clean <- drop_na(CK3.2_clean)
```

```{r}
CK3.2_all <- data.frame(unlist(CK3.2_clean))
colnames(CK3.2_all)[1] <- "Grades"
```


All Questions 
```{r}
CK3.2_all %>%
  count(Grades)
```

```{r}
CK3.2_all %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = Grades))
```
